headline: Keefe Bruyette Raises Target as Travelers Companies (TRV) Divests Canadian Businesses
summary: On Tuesday, May 27, The Travelers Companies Inc. (NYSE:TRV) announced an agreement to divest its personal insurance segment and most of its commercial insurance operations in Canada to Definity Financial Corp., a Canadian financial services company. The sale is valued at approximately $2.4 billion, implying an adjusted price-to-book value of 1.8 times, according to company […]
